about_the_game: This guide will help you through City of Broken Dreamers. It goes in depth on how to deal with the situations in the game. You can see what you need to do in order to unlock scenes or get to other parts of the game you may not even had known existed.

content_descriptors.notes: This guide has some brief nudity and some language that may be deemed offense.

detailed_description: This guide will help you through City of Broken Dreamers. It goes in depth on how to deal with the situations in the game. You can see what you need to do in order to unlock scenes or get to other parts of the game you may not even had known existed.

fullgame.name: City of Broken Dreamers: Book One

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or Kernel 3.x+ distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 Compatible
  • Storage: 12 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 Compatible
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
